Package serverSide.objects

Class ConcentrationSite

java.lang.Object
serverSide.objects.ConcentrationSite
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConcSiteInterface, Remote
public class ConcentrationSite extends Object implements ConcSiteInterface
Concentration Site. Is implemented as an implicit monitor. All public methods are executed in mutual exclusion. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on Java RMI.

    • appraiseSit

      public ReturnInt appraiseSit() throws RemoteException
      Transition appraise situation in the life cycle of the Master Thief. As long as the master thief remains in this transition -> state : DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO
      Specified by:
      appraiseSit in interface ConcSiteInterface
      Returns:
      next transition (DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO or ASSEMBLING_A_GROUP or WAITING_FOR_ARRIVAL or PRESENTING_THE_REPORT)
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • waitForThieves

      public void waitForThieves() throws RemoteException
      Master blocks until enough ordinary thieves have arrived the concentration site. Master is notified whenever a thief arrives at the concentration site (amINeeded()).
      Specified by:
      waitForThieves in interface ConcSiteInterface
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • amINeeded

      public ReturnBoolean amINeeded(int thiefID) throws RemoteException
      Transition am I Needed in the life cycle of the Ordinary Thief. When thieves are needed they are added to the waiting queue and notify the master. (waitForThieves()) CONCENTRATION_SITE -> CONCENTRATION_SITE : Thieves are blocked until they are called to form the assault groups. Or Thieves are blocked until they are no longer needed.
      Specified by:
      amINeeded in interface ConcSiteInterface
      Parameters:
      thiefID - ordinary thief id
      Returns:
      true if the heist is not finished and the ordinary thieves are still needed and OT state
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • buildParty

      public ReturnArrayInt buildParty() throws RemoteException
      Master creates a 3-member assault party
      Specified by:
      buildParty in interface ConcSiteInterface
      Returns:
      assault party with 3 thieves and master thief state
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • prepareAssaultParty

      public void prepareAssaultParty(int[] assaultParty, int assaultPartyID, int roomID) throws RemoteException
      Transition prepare Assault Party in the life cycle of the Master Thief. DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO -> ASSEMBLING_A_GROUP The master starts by creating a group of 3 elements, then notifies the thieves waiting on the queue.
      Specified by:
      prepareAssaultParty in interface ConcSiteInterface
      Parameters:
      assaultParty - list of ids of the 3 elements of the assault party
      assaultPartyID - identification assigned to the assault party
      roomID - room id assigned to the assault party
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • sendAssaultParty

      public void sendAssaultParty() throws RemoteException
      Transition send Assault Party in the life cycle of the Master Thief. ASSEMBLING_A_GROUP -> DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO After creating a group of 3, the master blocks and waits for the last thief to reach the group to wake it up. He is notified by the thief's prepare Excursion function.
      Specified by:
      sendAssaultParty in interface ConcSiteInterface
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • prepareExcursion

      public ReturnInt prepareExcursion(int thiefID) throws RemoteException
      Transition prepare Excursion in the life cycle of the Ordinary Thief. CONCENTRATION_SITE -> CRAWLING_INWARDS The thief notifies the master that the last member of the group has arrived.
      Specified by:
      prepareExcursion in interface ConcSiteInterface
      Parameters:
      thiefID - ordinary thief identification
      Returns:
      OT assault party id and OT state
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • sumUpResults

      public int sumUpResults(int collectedCanvas) throws RemoteException
      Transition sum Up Results in the life cycle of the Master Thief. Master collects the canvas. Last function to be called by the master thief kills threads and ends the simulation.
      Specified by:
      sumUpResults in interface ConcSiteInterface
      Parameters:
      collectedCanvas - number of canvas collected
      Returns:
      master Thief State
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails
